bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: ① Illness Sign identical with huan 緩① . Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 8: 偏枯、冷痹，緩弱疼重 , “Hemilateral withering; cold blockage; slackening , pain and a feeling of heaviness”.

② Pathological Condition identical with jiao qi 脚氣 , leg qi. Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 Substance Entry e shi 惡實：根，主牙齒 疼痛，勞瘧，脚緩弱，風毒癰疽 , “The root: it controls toothache, exhaustion malaria, slackening of the legs, and wind poison with obstruction- as well as impediment-illnesses”.
